title: Apple acknowledges iPhone 14 Pro camera bug, preps fix
description: Some users reported the iPhone 14 Pro camera shaking with apps like Snapchat and TikTok. Now Apple promises a fix

title: Newly leaked photo of Lenovo RTX 4090 model reveals a huge triple-slot design
description: A new picture of the Lenovo Legion GeForce RTX 4090 mode shows its massive size and triple-slot design.

title: Your browser spellchecker could be leaking your passwords
description: Extended spellcheckers in Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge have been found to be exposing passwords, payment details, and more.

title: I switched to eSIM on iPhone 14 Pro and am not looking back
description: All Apple iPhone 14 phones in the US use eSIMs and the transition is better than expected

title: The iPhone 14 repairability is 'incredible' and may be better iPhone 14 Pro
description: An iFixit teardown shows how much easier Apple has made fixing the iPhone 14 compared to the iPhone 14 Pro

title: GTA 6 leak confirmed by Rockstar Games, 'early development footage' is real
description: Developer Rockstar responds to the leak of early footage of GTA 6, saying it won't impact the development of the open-world game.

title: IHG data hack was done "for fun"
description: Vietnamese couple reportedly carried out the attack on the hotel company "for fun".

title: Will Apple make an iPhone 15 Ultra with an ultra-high price tag?
description: A new leak solidifies iPhone 15 Ultra naming, and suggests a higher price tag and possibly more features for a larger iPhone next year. The leak also says USB-C may be coming to all iPhone 15 devices.

title: The best iPhone 14 Pro feature is set to come to every iPhone 15 model
description: The early indications are that the iPhone 15 and the iPhone 15 Plus will get the Dynamic Island like the Pro models.

title: WhatsApp and Apple should be wary of neat leaked Google Messages feature
description: It looks as though there are some significant upgrades on the way if you use Google's messaging app on Android.

title: Expectations rise as Xiaomi’s cheaper phones leak with high-end specs
description: We were expecting the Xiaomi 12 and the Xiaomi 12 Pro to get mid-range versions – and here they are.

title: Sony FX30 leaks, rumors and what we want to see
description: Is Sony working on an ASP-C version of its FX3 video camera? The rumors mill seems to think so and it could launch soon.
